details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.8 Extension schemas - Extension schema ValueType type - field field
details.description: Field 'field' of the PDF/A ValueType value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Seq Field and namespace prefix 'pdfaType'.

rule.description: Field 'field' of the PDF/A ValueType value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Seq Field and namespace prefix 'pdfaType'.

error.message: Field 'field' of the PDF/A ValueType value type doesn't have prefix 'pdfaType' (field prefix = %1) or doesn't have type Seq Field (isFieldValidSeq = %2)
